faqs.question: Могут ли иностранцы купить недвижимость в Испании?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Non-EU citizens can purchase Spanish property without restrictions. You'll need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and can obtain mortgages through Spanish banks. The process typically takes 4-8 weeks from agreement to completion. Legal representation is recommended to navigate paperwork and ensure all protections are in place.

faqs.question: Каковы расходы на покупку недвижимости в Испании?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, budget approximately 10-13% for additional costs: 6-7% property transfer tax (ITP), 1.5% notary and registration fees, and 2-3% for legal representation and inspections. So on a €365,000 purchase, expect total costs of €40,000-47,000. These are one-time expenses at purchase.

faqs.question: Является ли Коста-Бланка хорошим местом для покупки недвижимости?
faqs.answer: Yes, Costa Blanca is one of Spain's strongest property markets. Real estate appreciates 8% annually, rental income potential is genuine (€800/week typical), and the region offers excellent quality of life, healthcare, and international communities. San Fulgencio specifically has transformed into a family-friendly destination with modern amenities and authentic Spanish character.

faqs.question: Сколько составляет налог на недвижимость в Испании?
faqs.answer: Ежегодные налоги на недвижимость (IBI) average 0.4-0.8% of property value depending on location. For this €365,000 villa, expect €1,500-2,900 annually. Additional costs include community fees if applicable (typically €50-150/month for developments). These ongoing costs are significantly lower than UK council tax and provide excellent value.

faqs.question: Могу ли я получить ипотеку в Испании как иностранец?
faqs.answer: Yes, major Spanish banks offer mortgages to non-EU residents. Typical rates are 3-4.5% with 30-year terms available. Lenders typically require 30% deposit, proof of income, and credit verification. Pre-approval takes 2-3 weeks. Many international buyers combine Spanish mortgages with UK equity release for optimal financing.

faqs.question: Какова стоимость жизни на Коста-Бланке?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca offers exceptional value: groceries are 30-40% cheaper than UK, utilities average €80-120/month, dining out is €8-15 per person, and healthcare is affordable. Families typically live comfortably on €1,500-2,000/month excluding mortgage. Many find their lifestyle improves while costs decrease compared to northern Europe.

faqs.question: Как далеко Коста-Бланка от России?
faqs.answer: Alicante-Elche Airport is just 40 minutes from San Fulgencio with direct flights to London, Birmingham, and Manchester—typically 2.5-3 hours flight time. Alternatively, drive to ferry ports (8-10 hours) for vehicle shipping. Budget airlines offer competitive fares, making UK visits affordable and manageable for families maintaining connections home.

faqs.question: Какая погода на Коста-Бланке?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca enjoys 300+ days of Mediterranean sunshine annually. Winters are mild (average 15°C, rarely freezing), while summers reach 28-32°C moderated by sea breezes. Rainfall is minimal (200-300mm annually), mostly in autumn and spring. Perfect for outdoor living, beach time, and year-round activities—families appreciate the predictable, healthy climate.

faqs.question: Is this villa suitable for a growing family?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Three bedrooms accommodate parents plus two children comfortably, with flexibility for guest rooms or home offices. The 176m² plot provides safe outdoor space for children to play, and the neighborhood is specifically family-oriented. San Fulgencio offers excellent schools, safe streets for children, and established family communities.
